import React from 'react'; import "./Dashboard.css"; function Dashboard({ onLogout, submitted }) { const username = localStorage.getItem('username') || 'Student'; // Use submitted prop only, not localStorage return (
Exam Portal
{username}

Welcome, {username}!

Ready to take your exam?

Click the button below to start your exam session.

Exam Details
Duration: 30 minutes
Questions: 30 multiple choice
One-time submission only
Instructions
  • Read each question carefully
  • Select only one answer per question
  • Use Next/Previous to navigate
  • Submit before finishing

Start Your Exam

{!submitted ? ( ) : ( )}
); } export default Dashboard;
